name: Drop Kitchen Chaos
description:
Grab your pots and catch the falling food. Brew the finest meals and deliver them to make your customers happy. But be careful not to create a mess while doing it.

CONTROLS: Drag and drop pots with your mouse.

More detailed instructions in the game.

-------------------

A game created from scratch for the GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 4, 29.06.18 - 01.07.18.

Programs used to create this game:

  • Unity 2018.1
  • Inkscape 0.91
